Ill admit, INDmoney has a really attractive and userfriendly interface its easy to navigate and visually appealing. But what really disappointed me is their claim of no hidden charges. After comparing with Groww, I realized INDmoney adds several hidden fees that arent clearly disclosed upfront. The DP charges and other costs eat into profits, especially for small trades. Its frustrating and feels misleading. Great design, but poor transparency. Not a good experience overall.
